column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Good American style tapas. This is not authentic Spanish tapas
column2: neither in presentation nor flavor. However
column3: the menu is very clear about what you are ordering
column4: and it's hard to go wrong since everything we had was good. The serrano ham tasted a lot like prosciutto
column6: but the bacon wrapped dates made up for it. We only tried the traditional red sangria
column7: but it was excellent. Not too sweet or fruity
column8: but had an ample amount of sliced fruit in the drink.
